enWisdom: The people of the Qur’an are the people of Allah and His special servants
Let your nightly conversation partner be the Qur’an

Wisdom: لَيْسَ لِأَحَدٍ بَعْدَ الْقُرْآنِ مِنْ فَاقَةٍ وَلَا لِأَحَدٍ قَبْلَ‏ الْقُرْآنِ غِنًى
enWisdom: There is no poverty for anyone after the Qur’an nor is there any affluence for anyone before it
